name: onApplicationEnd
description: Defined in Application.cfc, invoked when the application times out or when the server is shutting down.

params.name: ApplicationScope
params.description: The application scope of the application that is ending.

examples.title: Write to log when onApplicationEnd is triggered
examples.description: Write to the log that application has ended. In the example below, text 'myApp ended on {current date/time}' gets added to D:\CF\logs\myApp.log file. Note: Application has already ended, but we can use ApplicationScope argument to access any Application scope variables.
